songs.title: Plantation (freestyle)
songs.lyrics:
XXXTENTACION (verse):
Ever feel the pain, vro?
Dead inside had the brains blown out?
Broken inside and out?
Mouth to mouth
Born from the south
Grew up wit' mom
Out and about
Filled with ecstacy
No euphoria
Can’t think no more
Cause god it hurts
Every day
Feels the same

Shiloh Dynasty (chorus) :
God my life is pain
Souless like a soul train
Traveling down
Momosa Lane
Dark and cloudy like rain
